snippet: Paul George had 29 points and 11 rebounds, and the Indiana Pacers held the Miami Heat to a season-low point total in an 87-77 win Tuesday in Indianapolis.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers beat Miami Heat, 87-77; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Paul George had 29 points and 11 rebounds, and the Indiana Pacers held the Miami Heat to a season-low point total in an 87-77 win Tuesday in Indianapolis.

headline.main: Surging Pacers Hold Heat to 77 Points, a Season Low
headline.print_headline: Surging Pacers Hold Heat to 77 Points, a Season Low
